name: The Onus Helm - KickStarter Demo
description:
==>KICKSTARTER DEMO PLEASE SUPPORT THIS PROJECT<===

This is the KICKSTARTER Demo for The Onus Helm. Please check it out and support the campaign.

STORY:  

How do you find hope in a cursed world? After awakening to discover the weight of the Helm on your shoulders, you must discover the truth behind it; if you want it removed. Unsure of where to go next, you roam through various rooms in a seemingly endless maze looking for a way to overcome its burden.

DESCRIPTION:  

The Onus Helm is a randomly generated action adventure game with Rogue-like elements. Discover your own adventure in this dungeon crawler as you unravel the mystery behind the Helm and the condition of the world. Find weapons, discover secret areas, and gain new abilities to fight off mysterious creatures in order to remove the Helm and find hope for the world. 

FEATURES: 

  • Melee and ranged combat  
  • Randomly generated levels  
  • Wide range of weapons and items to collect  
  • Keyboard & gamepad controller support  
  • Wide variety of bosses and enemies to defeat
  • Built in speed run clock
  • Permadeath
